summary:
This mod simply adds an elderly poison & alchemy ingredients merchant named 'Larius Vesuvius' to the
Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Whiterun Poison Merchant[/size][/color][/font]

[img]https://s26.postimg.org/9zqc6sg49/20180223134123_1.jpg[/img]﻿

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]This mod simply adds an elderly poison & alchemy ingredients merchant named 'Larius Vesuvius' to the 
[/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Bannered Mare in Whiterun. He has a nice stock of pretty much every type of posion reagent you'd need (lower[/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]quantity on the more rare items). His merchant container is set to respawn so his stock SHOULD reset every [/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]so many odd days. His vendor hours are set from 0 - 24 (like Tonilia), so basically he is a 24/7 poison merchant.

[/size][/color][/font][color=#3c78d8][size=5][i]Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested![/i][/size][/color]
author: AedanStarfang
